mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (ID, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_PHONE) VALUES(SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword}
SELECT USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname}
SELECT SUB_CATEGORY_ID FROM TBL_INTEREST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
